slogan-1: 新加坡领先的餐饮解决方案供应商
slogan-2:
The leading food solution provider
 for F&B in Singapore
benefit-1-description: Vegetable / Fruit / Seasonings & Dried Goods / Steamed Buns / Frozen Goods / Drinks
benefit-2-description: We do have some fresh processed products
benefit-3-description: All fresh vegetables and fruits are transported by cold chain from the origin to our storage
business-description: 24/7 operation for ordering, packing, delivery and customer service.
business-1-description: Pick all you need on your phone and submit order anytime. anywhere.
business-2-description: We pack your products at a safe ambient temperature to keep fresh.
business-3-description: We deliver your order within 1 ~ 8 hours after packing.
business-4-description: Check your cost and bill on your phone anythime anywhere and make the payment with Bank Transfer / Giro, Paynow, Cheque, etc.
partner-1-description: As a trusted partner, we serve more than 1000 F&B businesses such as Haidilao Hot Pot, Putien, Wen Jia Bao and A Kitchen.
evaluation-description-3: , Ebuy has been striving to improve the customer experience and your business efficiency.
evaluation-1-customer-text: The meat is fresh and just right. Surveyor carefully read the remarks, the work is in place.
evaluation-2-customer-text: Ebuy's food prices are affordable, and the quality is excellent, making our restaurant's profits more substantial.
evaluation-3-customer-text: I have bought their melons many times. They are really delicious and sweet. Every time, customers praise them, hoping that the quality will always be so good.
evaluation-4-customer-text: Ebuy offers a wide variety of high-quality ingredients, enabling us to meet the needs of various dishes in our restaurant.
evaluation-5-customer-text: So night, brother hard, fast delivery. Thank you！
evaluation-6-customer-text: This apple is better than Aksu in New Zealand! Crispy and sweet! The ugliest apple I've ever seen and the best apple I've ever eaten
evaluation-7-customer-text: The shrimp is bigger and fresh than expected! Thank you picker!
evaluation-8-customer-text: Ebuy's food prices are affordable, and the quality is excellent, making our restaurant's profits more substantial.
evaluation-9-customer-text: This saves me a lot of time without having to manually arrange reservations and train staff. It's a very smart system that enhances the ordering experience for my customers.
evaluation-10-customer-text: Easy to adapt to our business model, including delivery services.
evaluation-11-customer-text: Unlike other previous systems, there is no complex back end. Our managers can easily change anything they need directly from the application.
evaluation-12-customer-text: The date is fresh, and shopping at Ebuy never disappoints.
evaluation-13-customer-text: Carp as always good, fresh, scallion oil steamed without smell, has been repurchase.
evaluation-14-customer-text: Our customers praised the freshness of the dishes more than once. Great collaboration！
evaluation-15-customer-text: As a restaurant owner, I have always trusted the ingredients provided by Ebuy, and they have never let me down.
evaluation-16-customer-text: Ebuy offers a wide variety of high-quality ingredients, providing more options for our restaurant's menu.
location-1-description: Ebuy mainly provides online-to-offline services in Singapore and Malaysia, We also have an office in China.
location-3-name: 成都海獭科技有限公司
